data.current_summary: See details about this account's teams
data.summary_suggestion: List all teams in the account
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a collection of all teams available in the account. Returns team objects containing team identifiers, names, and descriptions. Use this to view team assignments for user provisioning and management.

message: Operation 'post-/settings/v3/users/_create' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is clear and actionable. Description provides context about permissions and email but lacks input/output details. Enhanced to specify request schema expectations, clarify what is returned, and explain the complete user creation workflow for AI agents.

data.current_description: New users will only have minimal permissions, which is contacts-base. A welcome email will prompt them to set a password and log in to HubSpot.
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new user in the account. Accepts a UserProvisionRequest containing email, name, and optional role/team assignments. New users receive minimal permissions (contacts-base) by default and are sent a welcome email to set their password and complete login. Returns the created user object with assigned identifiers and initial permissions.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description provides context about permissions and email but lacks input/output details. Enhanced to specify request schema expectations, clarify what is returned, and explain the complete user creation workflow for AI agents.

data.current_description: Modifies a user identified by `userId`. `userId` refers to the user's ID by default, or optionally email as specified by the `IdProperty` query param.

Supports partial updates - only provided fields are modified.

message: Operation 'delete-/settings/v3/users/{userId}_archive' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_side_effects. data.current_description: Removes a user identified by `userId`. `userId` refers to the user's ID by default, or optionally email as specified by the `IdProperty` query param.
data.description_suggestion: Archives (removes) a user identified by `userId` (by user ID or email via IdProperty parameter). The user is deactivated and removed from the account, losing access to HubSpot. This action is permanent and cannot be undone. Returns a success response upon completion.
data.reasoning: Summary uses 'Removes' which is vague about the actual operation (archive vs delete). Description lacks context about permanence and side effects. Enhanced to clarify that this is an archive operation, explain the consequences (access loss), note irreversibility, and set proper expectations for AI agents about this destructive operation.
